title: Red Carpet Studios 21052 3D Animal Planter, Rabbit, 10x14.5 inch
features: ANIMAL-SHAPED PLANTER: Statuary rabbit planter provides a delightful way to display plants and flowers; includes drainage hole
FUN GARDEN CHARACTER: Crafted from fiber clay for indoor or outdoor use; looks great in any garden, porch, or patio setting
FOR FLOWERS, HERBS, SUCCULENTS: Fill container with your favorite blossoms and greenery
ADD BEAUTY TO OUTDOOR SPACES: From Red Carpet Studios, a family-owned company offering original home and garden gifts
description: Fill this fun and playfully designed statuary planter with your favorite greenery or flowers. Includes drainage hole, crafted for indoor or outdoor use. Red Carpet Studios has been a family run business since 2000, when they introduced their now famous garden terrariums. Since then, Red Carpet has continued to explore the tranquility and allure of the outdoors and has expanded the Garden Studio line to include birdhouses, chimes, garden stakes, and a collection of kinetic garden decor. Everything you need to personalize your garden and more!
